name: Zapdos
description: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

attacks.name: Thunder Snipe
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon, and this attack does 160 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon V or Pokémon-GX. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
